abstracts.cdata!:
This is a statement by Terrie
            O'Leary at the meeting of November 2, 2000 concerning
            the Country Assistance Strategy, Public Resource Management
            Credit, and Public Resource ManagementTechnical Assistance
            Project for Sao Tome and Principe.
